rows:
<% @players.each do |player| if player.card.nil? then card = Card.new else card = player.card end if %> <row id="<%= card.id -%>"> <%=h player.user.name -%> <%=h format_nil(player.handicap,'-') -%> <%=h format_nil(player.tee.barras,'-') -%> <%=h format_nil(card.strokes_first_9,'-') -%> <%=h format_nil(card.strokes_second_9,'-') -%> <%=h format_nil(card.strokes_total,'-') -%>
<% end %>
